name: Translo
description: The best translator bot in whole Telegram

DASHBOT_API_KEY.description: An API key from dashbot.io. That's analytics service for bots

ADMIN_ID.description: ID of your telegram account. Start @translobot and send it "/id" command. There will be your telegram ID. Put it here

X-RAPIDAPI_KEY.description: API key for translation from https://rapidapi.com/armangokka/api/translo. You must be subscribed to any plan of this API
